sentences.en: A recurrence of such an oversight could impair our amicable relations.
sentences.cn: 这样的疏忽倘若再发生,可能有损双方的友好贸易关系.

sentences.en: Don't boil the sauce as this and impair the flavor.
sentences.cn: 酱汁还要煮沸,否则会影响味道.

sentences.en: However, such use may not impair their functions as air defense works.
sentences.cn: 平时利用人民防空工程,不得影响其防空效能.

sentences.en: In addition, sharp teeth impair effective chewing which prevents proper digestion of food.
sentences.cn: 此外, 锐利的牙齿削弱了有效的咀嚼,这样一来,就妨碍了食物的适当消化.

sentences.en: Insufficient ingestion of staple food may thus impair memory.
sentences.cn: 故主食摄取不足可能对记忆力造成损害.

sentences.en: It can not impair the intellectual vigor of the young.
sentences.cn: 这不能磨灭青年人思想活力.

sentences.en: Loud noise can impair your hearing.
May impair your ability to operate machinery.
sentences.cn: 也许这可以减缓你的机械化.

sentences.en: The author's half drunken state did not in the least impair his eminence in my eyes.
sentences.cn: 在我的眼里,这位作家的醺醺醉态丝毫无损他的高尚.

sentences.en: The high - glycemic meals, the authors conclude, appeared to impair the endothelial function.
sentences.cn: 由此, 研究者们得出结论, 高糖食物可降低内皮功能.

sentences.en: The illness had impaired his ability to think and concentrate.
sentences.cn: 这种疾病损害了他的思维能力和注意力。

sentences.en: The severely impair people health, has affected the environment quality.
sentences.cn: 严重危害了人民健康, 影响了环境质量.

sentences.en: This Act does not impair any right of indemnity under existing law.
sentences.cn: 本法并不削弱任何基于现行法的追偿权.

sentences.en: To mar is to injure or damage; to spoil disfigure, or impair.
sentences.cn: 损害, 就是伤害或毁坏 、 破坏、使之变形或削弱.

sentences.en: To weaken, injure, or impair, often by degrees or imperceptibly; sap.
sentences.cn: 逐渐损坏;暗中破坏:削弱 、 伤害或损害, 常是逐渐地或很轻微地; 使衰弱.

sentences.en: Vessel pollution, whether accident or discharged, would impair seriously marine environment.
sentences.cn: 船舶污染, 无论是事故性的还是排放性的, 都会给海洋环境造成重大危害.

words.tran_cn: 损害（impaire的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_en: to damage something or make it not as good as it should be
to damage something or make it not as good as it should be
